paper.title: Explainable artificial intelligence for crypto asset allocation
paper.abstract: Many investors have been attracted by Crypto assets in the last few years. However, despite the possibility of gaining high returns, investors bear high risks in crypto markets. To help investors and make the markets more reliable, Robot advisory services are rapidly expanding in the field of crypto asset allocation. Robot advisors not only reduce costs but also improve the quality of the service by involving investors and make the market more transparent. However, the reason behind the given solutions is not clear and users face a black-box model that is complex. The aim of this paper is to improve trustworthiness of robot advisors, to facilitate their adoption. For this purpose, we apply Shapley values to the predictions generated by a machine learning model based on the results of a dynamic Markowitz portfolio optimization model and provide explanations for what is behind the selected portfolio weights.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是应用Shapley值和机器学习模型来解释动态Markowitz投资组合优化模型的结果，旨在提高机器人顾问的可信度和透明度。这直接涉及投资组合管理的领域，特别是加密货币资产的配置。
